scripts.dev: concurrently -n auth,catalog,gateway,orders,seller -c auto "npm --prefix ./auth run dev" "npm --prefix ./catalog run dev" "npm --prefix ./gateway run dev" "npm --prefix ./orders run dev" "npm --prefix ./seller run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n auth,catalog,gateway,orders,seller -c auto "npm --prefix ./auth start" "npm --prefix ./catalog start" "npm --prefix ./gateway start" "npm --prefix ./orders start" "npm --prefix ./seller start"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix ./auth i && npm --prefix ./catalog i && npm --prefix ./gateway i && npm --prefix ./orders i && npm --prefix ./seller i
